019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.Gson;
022import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery.APIResource;
023import io.kubernetes.client.apimachinery.GroupVersionKind;
024import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
025import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
026import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
029import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
030import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
031import java.util.Optional;
032import java.util.function.Function;
033
034/**
035 * A stub for namespaced custom objects.
036 *
037 * @param <O> the generic type
038 * @param <L> the generic type
039 */
040@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
041public class K8sGenericStub<O extends KubernetesObject,
042        L extends KubernetesListObject> {
043    protected final K8sClient client;
044    private final GenericKubernetesApi<O, L> api;
045    protected final String group;
046    protected final String version;
047    protected final String kind;
048    protected final String plural;
049    protected final String namespace;
050    protected final String name;
051
052    /**
053     * Instantiates a new namespaced custom object stub.
054     * @param group the group
055     * @param version the version
056     * @param plural the plural
057     * @param namespace the namespace
058     * @param name the name
059     */
060    public K8sGenericStub(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
061            K8sClient client, APIResource context, String namespace,
062            String name) {
063        this.client = client;
064        group = context.getGroup();
065        version = context.getPreferredVersion();
066        kind = context.getKind();
067        plural = context.getResourcePlural();
068        this.namespace = namespace;
069        this.name = name;
070
071        Gson gson = client.getJSON().getGson();
072        if (!checkAdapters(client)) {
073            client.getJSON().setGson(gson.newBuilder()
074                .registerTypeAdapterFactory(
075                    new K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory())
076                .create());
077        }
078        api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(objectClass,
079            objectListClass, group, version, plural, client);
080    }
081
082    private boolean checkAdapters(ApiClient client) {
083        return K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory.K8sDynamicModelCreator.class
084            .equals(client.getJSON().getGson().getAdapter(K8sDynamicModel.class)
085                .getClass())
086            && K8sDynamicModelTypeAdapterFactory.K8sDynamicModelsCreator.class
087                .equals(client.getJSON().getGson()
088                    .getAdapter(K8sDynamicModels.class).getClass());
089    }
090
091    /**
092     * Gets the group.
093     *
094     * @return the group
095     */
096    public String group() {
097        return group;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Gets the version.
102     *
103     * @return the version
104     */
105    public String version() {
106        return version;
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * Gets the kind.
111     *
112     * @return the kind
113     */
114    public String kind() {
115        return kind;
116    }
117
118    /**
119     * Gets the plural.
120     *
121     * @return the plural
122     */
123    public String plural() {
124        return plural;
125    }
126
127    /**
128     * Gets the namespace.
129     *
130     * @return the namespace
131     */
132    public String namespace() {
133        return namespace;
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * Gets the name.
138     *
139     * @return the name
140     */
141    public String name() {
142        return name;
143    }
144
145    /**
146     * Get a namespaced object stub. If the version in parameter
147     * `gvk` is an empty string, the stub refers to the first object with
148     * matching group and kind. 
149     *
150     * @param <O> the object type
151     * @param <L> the object list type
152     * @param <R> the stub type
153     * @param objectClass the object class
154     * @param objectListClass the object list class
155     * @param client the client
156     * @param gvk the group, version and kind
157     * @param namespace the namespace
158     * @param name the name
159     * @param provider the provider
160     * @return the stub if the object exists
161     * @throws ApiException the api exception
162     */
163    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
164        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
165    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
166            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
167            R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
168                    K8sClient client, GroupVersionKind gvk, String namespace,
169                    String name, StubSupplier<O, L, R> provider)
170                    throws ApiException {
171        var context = K8s.context(client, gvk.getGroup(), gvk.getVersion(),
172            gvk.getKind());
173        if (context.isEmpty()) {
174            throw new ApiException("No known API for " + gvk.getGroup()
175                + "/" + gvk.getVersion() + " " + gvk.getKind());
176        }
177        return provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass, client, context.get(),
178            namespace, name);
179    }
180
181    /**
182     * Get a namespaced object stub.
183     *
184     * @param <O> the object type
185     * @param <L> the object list type
186     * @param <R> the stub type
187     * @param objectClass the object class
188     * @param objectListClass the object list class
189     * @param client the client
190     * @param context the context
191     * @param namespace the namespace
192     * @param name the name
193     * @param provider the provider
194     * @return the stub if the object exists
195     * @throws ApiException the api exception
196     */
197    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
198        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
199    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
200            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
201            R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
202                    K8sClient client, APIResource context, String namespace,
203                    String name, StubSupplier<O, L, R> provider)
204                    throws ApiException {
205        return provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass, client,
206            context, namespace, name);
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Get a namespaced object stub for a newly created object.
211     *
212     * @param <O> the object type
213     * @param <L> the object list type
214     * @param <R> the stub type
215     * @param objectClass the object class
216     * @param objectListClass the object list class
217     * @param client the client
218     * @param context the context
219     * @param model the model
220     * @param provider the provider
221     * @return the stub if the object exists
222     * @throws ApiException the api exception
223     */
224    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidBranchingStatementAsLastInLoop",
225        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI" })
226    public static <O extends KubernetesObject, L extends KubernetesListObject,
227            R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>>
228            R create(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass,
229                    K8sClient client, APIResource context, O model,
230                    StubSupplier<O, L, R> provider) throws ApiException {
231        var api = new GenericKubernetesApi<>(objectClass, objectListClass,
232            context.getGroup(), context.getPreferredVersion(),
233            context.getResourcePlural(), client);
234        api.create(model).throwsApiException();
235        return provider.get(objectClass, objectListClass, client,
236            context, model.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
237            model.getMetadata().getName());
238    }
239
240    /**
241     * Delete the Kubernetes object.
242     *
243     * @throws ApiException the API exception
244     */
245    public void delete() throws ApiException {
246        api.delete(namespace, name).throwsApiException();
247    }
248
249    /**
250     * Retrieves and returns the current state of the object.
251     *
252     * @return the object's state
253     * @throws ApiException the api exception
254     */
255    public Optional<O> model() throws ApiException {
256        return K8s.optional(api.get(namespace, name));
257    }
258
259    /**
260     * Updates the object's status.
261     *
262     * @param object the current state of the object (passed to `status`)
263     * @param status function that returns the new status
264     * @return the updated model or empty if not successful
265     * @throws ApiException the api exception
266     */
267    public Optional<O> updateStatus(O object,
268            Function<O, Object> status) throws ApiException {
269        return K8s.optional(api.updateStatus(object, status));
270    }
271
272    /**
273     * Updates the status.
274     *
275     * @param status the status
276     * @return the kubernetes api response
277     * the updated model or empty if not successful
278     * @throws ApiException the api exception
279     */
280    public Optional<O> updateStatus(Function<O, Object> status)
281            throws ApiException {
282        return updateStatus(
283            api.get(namespace, name).throwsApiException().getObject(), status);
284    }
285
286    /**
287     * Patch the object.
288     *
289     * @param patchType the patch type
290     * @param patch the patch
291     * @param options the options
292     * @return the kubernetes api response
293     * @throws ApiException the api exception
294     */
295    public Optional<O> patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch,
296            PatchOptions options) throws ApiException {
297        return K8s
298            .optional(api.patch(namespace, name, patchType, patch, options));
299    }
300
301    /**
302     * Patch the object using default options.
303     *
304     * @param patchType the patch type
305     * @param patch the patch
306     * @return the kubernetes api response
307     * @throws ApiException the api exception
308     */
309    public Optional<O>
310            patch(String patchType, V1Patch patch) throws ApiException {
311        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
312        return patch(patchType, patch, opts);
313    }
314
315    /**
316     * A supplier for Stubs.
317     *
318     * @param <O> the object type
319     * @param <L> the object list type
320     * @param <R> the result type
321     */
322    public interface StubSupplier<O extends KubernetesObject,
323            L extends KubernetesListObject, R extends K8sGenericStub<O, L>> {
324
325        /**
326         * Gets a new stub.
327         *
328         * @param objectClass the object class
329         * @param objectListClass the object list class
330         * @param client the client
331         * @param context the API resource
332         * @param namespace the namespace
333         * @param name the name
334         * @return the result
335         */
336        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI")
337        R get(Class<O> objectClass, Class<L> objectListClass, K8sClient client,
338                APIResource context, String namespace, String name);
339    }
340}
